title: Honor level
body: Recently i have been playing more and more often, and i was testing my ability in the game by trying a ranked match. During this match i got angry and got reported by several people for negative attitude. Riot sent me a message on my next login telling me i had a penalty and i lost my honor and the access to rewards, however soon later i got out of the penalty box and started getting rewards again but wasn't getting my honor level back. I have a question and want to know if there is a solution to being able to get my honor level back after being banned in a way... just because i have tried and i am stuck at honor level 1.

replies.body:
Congrats on having that lock removed first off! That does mean you're on the way, but I did notice that some of the language/behavior in recent games could be viewed as almost borderline toxic/punishable. Instead of actually swinging the 'banhammer' if you will, the system threw you a bone perse and just slowed your honor gain. 

You're more than welcome to reach out in a ticket for more context about what's being said and why it could be holding you back.
